Definition: Attribute name; the code used to identify this attribute; most often this will be the table or spreadsheet column name.
A descriptive name associated with the Domain Item value; Default is to use the Domain Item Value; Colum name rows are 'colname'
The Domain Item value; the value in the table; colum name rows are 'colname'
A succinct but comprehensive definition for the attribute or Domain Item
The datatype or format of the entry values for an attribute; choose from drop down
Indicates whether null values are permitted as the attribute value (yes/no)
A unit-of-measure for the attribute. E.g. 'meters', 'atmospheres', 'liters'; Unrestricted, though SI units are recommended; lowercase only
The smallest unit increment to which an attribute value is measured.
The minimum range value permissible for this attribute. The minimum value may be either numeric or character.
The maximum range value permissible for this attribute. The maximum value may be either numeric or character.
Indicates if the content of the data set is encoded in case-sensitive ASCII (yes/no)
Anything entered here will be excluded from the JSON dictionary
